post.content:
Warning: This message may not be from whom it claims to be. Beware of following any links in it or of providing the sender with any personal information. Good Morning:
I am working with a client in Boca Raton that has a 6 month contract position for an E-Commerce Developer. Please review the following description and send your resume if your resume if you are interested.
Thanks.
E-Commerce Developer
Strong e-Commerce and Software Product Development Experience, overall 7-10 years experience in application development, JEE, SOA / Web Services
SKILLS:
Three or more years of experience in application development with a strong focus on e-commerce and software product development.
Must have experience with Java, Object-oriented design principles, Web Services and SOA, JSP, HTML, and relational databases.
Experience in the one or more of the following areas are desired: Javascript, CSS, Struts, Spring, WebSphere/Weblogic, DHTML, AJAX.
JOB DESCRIPTION:
This is an unique opportunity for a highly motivated e-commerce developer to join a team of expert e-commerce developers. The developer will be part of a team that drives innovation and introduces new/advanced technologies to the e-commerce sites globally.
The developer will lead/participate in the design, development and deployment of transactional e-commerce websites and tools.
CANDIDATE REQUIREMENTS:
* Strong e-commerce and / or software product development experience * Three or more years experience in application development * Experience with Java, Object-oriented design principles, Web Services and SOA, JSP, and HTML * Experience in the one or more of the following areas are desired: Javascript, CSS, Struts, Spring, WebSphere/Weblogic, DHTML, AJAX. * Experience working with relational databases * Experience building front end consumer websites * Experience building N-tier web and business applications * Experience working with core e-commerce elements; shopping cart, site search / navigation, product data feeds and credit card processing * Experience working with a variety of Content Management Systems a plus * Experience implementing SOA / Web Services as the core development methodology * Demonstrated focus on quality (unit testing, system testing, user acceptance testing) * Experience working with and implementing third party e-commerce services including, but not limited to: Payment methods (PayPal, Google Checkout), Customer product reviews, Site analytics (Coremetrics), SEO/SEM, and and on-site searches (Endeca, Google)
* Bachelors degree in Computer Science or equivalent required * Masters degree in Computer Science a plus
Sincerely,
Andrea Skinner Senior Technical Recruiter askinner@aptude.com Aptude, Inc. 630-692-6700x18
If you want to be removed please reply with Remove as subject
post.title: 6 month contract position for an E-Commerce Developer
